A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Regarding this Last Jedi...

Nothing in this movie makes sense.

Terrible Writing. Disney loves to kill off the parents (Luke\, Han) in order to promote alienation and consumption of merchandise. Insulting character assassination of Luke. Subverting Mythology. 

The Hero's Journey without the journey. No stakes. Rey is a Disney Princess\, she doesn't need Jedi training to master the Force. I guess Millennials can just download a Jedi Master app and beat up Luke Fucking Skywalker\, Are you kidding me? 

Joseph Campbell talked about the conflict between the transcendent (archetypal) and the didactic (political/mundane) in art. That is the difference between the OG trilogy and the Disney reboot. Sad. 

Boyega was awesome in Attack the Block\, then they turned Finn into Steppin Fetchit. Ridiculous. 

Emo Ren has no motivation. Fucking Twilight in Space. 

They turned Princess Leiah into Mary Poppins? Why

Disney doesn't have a true SJW agenda. They are simply using a fake liberal marketing strategy like Benetton in order to expand market perfusion and cross market profitability into "new markets." Disney is a corporate capitalist company that uses slave labor. Like Idiocracy & Brave New World\, Disney's culture shaping agenda is to disconnect story from meaning. Thereby increasing the level of anomie and anxiety in society which stimulates consumerism and impulse shopping. $$$

I prefer the feminism of Riane Eisler in The Chalice and the Blade to Disney's fake feminism.

Why not free the slave kids? Oh right\, because Disney uses slave labor. Fuck Disney.

The only point I appreciated was DJ's criticism of weapons contractors.

Fantasia Sorcerer's Apprentice ending was nauseating.

I want an apology from Disney.
